attributes.additional_details:
The Big Table have been served notice to vacate their premises by the end of January 2012.

This is a business that has provided a specialist and bespoke service for many years making fantastic hand made beds and based in beautiful historic premises and personally I have used them for the last 28 years.

It would be a shame for they Co Operative to disapear from this area so please sign this petition to save The Big Table.

rejection.details: This is certainly not a matter for the Department for Transport; but it is not clear in any case what action is being proposed.
